Container.Name: EtherCalc
Container.Overview:
DESCRIPTION EtherCalc is a web spreadsheet. Your data is saved on the web, and people can edit the same document at the same time. Everybody's changes are instantly reflected on all screens. Work together on inventories, survey forms, list management, brainstorming sessions and more!
NOTES • Redis server is not required, if you don't want it. Check 'https://github.com/audreyt/ethercalc#installation' to know more.
VERSION 1.0 (2022-02-11)

Config.Name: REDIS_PORT_6379_TCP_ADDR
Config.Description: This is the Redis server IP. Delete that entry if not used.

Config.Name: REDIS_PORT_6379_TCP_PORT
Config.Description: This is the Redis server port. Delete that entry if not used.
